pr_title: Enable tests related to DROP TABLE in MongoDB

timeline.message: Enable tests related to DROP TABLE in MongoDB

timeline.bodyText:
For the future, i suggest we disable tests in more "auto-managed" way, like
assertThatThrownBy(() -> super.test())
  .hasMessage("foo bar");

that way we won't forget to uncomment them
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: @findepi Agreed, it's a good idea. Let me filter with it from next time.
replies.author: ebyhr
